page.title: 08BROADFORD HOSPITAL page1
page.content: There are 28 patient beds in the {Mackinnon Memorial Hospital.}There are eleven rooms or wards in the hospital and there are also people who are out-patients. There is between thirty and forty bad accidents a year when the ambulance has to go out.About 300 tourists are treated in hospital every year.The hospital has two part-time doctors and two full-time doctors.There is twenty five nurses and twenty other people working in the hospital providing catering,cleaning and secretarial services. Eight hundred complicated operations are carried out each year but really difficult operations have to be sent to Raigmore Hospital in Inverness.
